meanings.definition: The state of being poor or lacking wealth.
meanings.sent1: Her poorness prevented her from buying new clothes.
meanings.sent2: The community came together to help those in poorness.
meanings.sent3: Despite his poorness, he always had a smile on his face.
meanings.sent4: The poorness of the soil made it difficult to grow crops.
meanings.sent5: The poorness of the neighborhood was evident in the run-down buildings.

meanings.definition: The quality of being of inferior quality or value.
meanings.sent1: The poorness of the material was evident in its rough texture.
meanings.sent2: The product's poorness was reflected in its low price.
meanings.sent3: The poorness of the painting gave it a unique charm.
meanings.sent4: The poorness of the construction led to frequent repairs.
meanings.sent5: The poorness of the ingredients affected the taste of the dish.
